name: Promaq
description:
Promaq is a first person parkour game that being in a different universe and different planets. Sometimes you could have extreme powers and use these powers to finish the missions, sometimes you can't even jump. And in this universe, get ready and start to parkour. Promaq waits for you, now participate in this universe.

Promaq is developed by Talha Emir Şeker and translated to English by Oğuz Kağan Öztürk.
